title: What is a teaching strategy? - Quora

response.answer_text: Teaching strategies is a methods that used to help students in learning the desired course contents and be able to develop achievable goals in the future. These are the following teaching strategies: Similarities and difference in identification is a strategy that used to enables learners to compare and contrast the different elements.Homework and practice is also a teaching strategy that enables students to practice skills acquired from the previous lectures.Non linguistic representation is also a teaching strategy that help to pass a message to the learners through mental images, physical models, pictorial representations, graphical organisers and flow charts.

Teaching strategy would be the methods of instruction used by the teacher to help students to learn and to apply their knowledge to achieve their academic goals. The teacher must take into account the age of the students, their level, the setting of the class, the length of the class and the curriculum. The teacher might use different teaching aids to reach all students with different learning styles and abilities.
